name: Sparring Regimen
oracle_text:
When Sparring Regimen enters the battlefield, learn. (You may reveal a Lesson card you own from outside the game and put it into your hand, or discard a card to draw a card.)
Whenever you attack, put a +1/+1 counter on target attacking creature and untap it.

name: Spirit Summoning
oracle_text: Create a 3/2 red and white Spirit creature token.
flavor_text:
"Books are fantastic, but if you're really curious about the distant past, why not ask someone who was there?"
—Augusta, Lorehold dean

name: Stonebound Mentor
oracle_text: Whenever one or more cards leave your graveyard, scry 1.

name: Strict Proctor
oracle_text:
Flying
Whenever a permanent entering the battlefield causes a triggered ability to trigger, counter that ability unless its controller pays {2}.
flavor_text: "You might believe that being dead for centuries has made me more lenient. I think you'll find the opposite is true."

name: Thrilling Discovery
oracle_text: You gain 2 life. Then you may discard two cards. If you do, draw three cards.
flavor_text:
"This must be the lost city of Zantafar, where my people lived before becoming nomads. Think of the history we'll learn here."
_Quintorius, Lorehold mage-student

name: Thunderous Orator
oracle_text:
Vigilance
Whenever Thunderous Orator attacks, it gains flying until end of turn if you control a creature with flying. The same is true for first strike, double strike, deathtouch, indestructible, lifelink, menace, and trample.

name: Velomachus Lorehold
oracle_text:
Flying, vigilance, haste
Whenever Velomachus Lorehold attacks, look at the top seven cards of your library. You may cast an instant or sorcery spell with mana value less than or equal to Velomachus Lorehold's power from among them without paying its mana cost. Put the rest on the bottome of your library in a random order.

name: "Elemental Calling"
oracle_text: Create a 4/4 blue and red Elemental creature token.

name: "Tiger Surfer"
oracle_text: Magecraft — Whenever you cast or copy an instant or sorcery spell, until end of turn, target creature you control gains "When this creature leaves the battlefield, exile it instead" and "When this creature is exiled, create a 4/4 blue and red Elemental creature token."

name: "Sublime Rehearsal"
oracle_text: Look at the top three cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand, then put one of them on the bottom of your library, then exile the rest. Until end of turn, you may play cards exiled this way.

name: Grinning Ignus
oracle_text: {R}, Return Grinning Ignus to its owner's hand: Add {C}{C}{R}. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.

name: Magma Opus
oracle_text:
Magma Opus deals 4 damage divided as you choose among any number of targets. Tap two target permanents. Create a 4/4 blue and red Elemental creature token. Draw two cards.
{U/R}{U/R}, Discard Magma Opus: Create a Treasure token.

name: Magma Opus
oracle_text:
Magma Opus deals 4 damage divided as you choose among any number of targets. Tap two target permanents. Create a 4/4 blue and red Elemental creature token. Draw two cards.
{U/R}{U/R}, Discard Magma Opus: Create a Treasure token.
